content.text:
# List of chairmen of the Supreme Soviet of the Kirghiz Soviet Socialist Republic__disambig_1

The chairman of the Supreme Soviet of the Kirghiz Soviet Socialist Republic (from December 15, 1990: the Kyrgyz Republic) was the parliamentary speaker of that unicameral legislature. It was succeeded by a bicameral legislature 1995â€“2007.
